block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Newark Board of Public Utilities. Friday at 10 a.m. Board hearing room, 2 Gateway Center, eighth floor. (973) 648-2026. Newark Assembly Education Committee. Monday at 10 a.m. New Jersey Institute of Technology, 154 Summit Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Senate Budget and Appropriations Committee hearing. Monday at 10 a.m. and 1:30 p.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Assembly Budget Committee hearing. Tuesday at 10 a.m. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County

Atlantic City Planning Board. Wednesday at 10 a.m. City Hall, 1301 Bacharach Boulevard. (609) 347-5404. Northfield Board of Chosen Freeholders. Tuesday at 4 p.m. Stillwater Building, 201 South Shore Road. (609) 645-5900.
Bergen County

Leonia Environmental Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Borough Hall, 312 Broad Avenue. (201) 592-5741. Tenafly Historic Preservation Commission. Thursday at 8 p.m. Tenafly Town Hall, 100 Riveredge road. (201) 568-6100.
Essex County

Glen Ridge Historic Preservation Commission. Wednesday at 8 p.m. Borough of Glen Ridge Municipal Building, 825 Bloomfield Avenue. (973) 748-8400. Newark Municipal Council. Wednesday at 12:30 p.m. Newark City Hall, 920 Broad Street. (973) 733-3600. Nutley Blood pressure screening. Monday from 1:30 a.m. to 3 p.m. Nutley Public Affairs Building, 149 Chestnut Street. (973) 284-4975. Nutley Free walk-in immunization and nutrition evaluation clinic for infants and preschool children. Tuesday from 8:30 a.m. to noon. Nutley Public Affairs Building, 149 Chestnut Street. (973) 284-4975.
Hudson County
Hoboken City Council. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hoboken City Hall, 94 Washington Street. (201) 420-2070.
Hunterdon County

Clinton Community mental health services forum. Wednesday from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. North County Branch, Hunterdon County Library, 65 Halstead Street. (908) 788-1372. Flemington Board of Taxation. Tuesday at 10 a.m. Hunterdon County Main Street Complex, 71 Main Street. (908) 788-1173. Flemington Youth Services Commission. Wednesday at 3 p.m. Hunterdon Justice Complex, Park Avenue. (908) 788-1253. Lebanon Parks and Recreation Advisory Board. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Hunterdon County Arboretum, 1020 State Route 31. (908) 782-1158.
Mercer County
Princeton Regional Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5366.
Monmouth County

Bradley Beach Zoning Board of Adjustment. Thursday at 6:30 p.m. Bradley Beach Borough Hall, 701 Main Street. (732) 776-2999. Fair Haven Zoning Board of Adjustment. Thursday at 7:15 p.m. Fair Haven Municipal Building, 748 River Road. (732) 747-0241. Holmdel Township Committee. Thursday at 7 p.m. Holmdel Town Hall, 4 Crawfords Corner Road. (732) 946-2820.
Morris County

Denville Town Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Denville Municipal Building, 1 St. Marys Place. (973) 625-8300. Mine Hill Township Township Committee. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Mine Hill Municipal Building, 10 Baker Street. (973) 328-6909. Morris Plains Borough Council. Thursday at 8:30 p.m. Morris Plains Borough Hall, 531 Speedwell Avenue. (973) 538-2224.
Passaic County

Little Falls Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Municipal Building, 225 Main Street. (973) 256-0170. Paterson Planning Board. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Paterson City Hall, 155 Market Street. (973) 321-1500.
Somerset County
Hillsborough Zoning Board of Adjustment. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Hillsborough Municipal Complex, 379 South Branch Road. (908) 369-4313.
Sussex County

Newton Township Committee. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Stillwater Township Municipal Building, 964 Stillwater Road. (973) 383-9484. Vernon Free glaucoma screening for the elderly. Thursday from 10 a.m. to noon. Vernon Senior Citizen Center, Church Street. (973) 579-0555.
Union County

Berkeley Heights Planning Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Berkeley Heights, 29 Park Avenue. (908) 464-2700. New Providence Planning Board. Tuesday at 8 p.m. New Providence Bough Hall, 360 Elkwood Avenue. (908) 665-1400.
